TextFlow.header: Replacing ordinary words with ones that are more accurate and livelier
TextFlow.p: Try to find synonyms or different words for some of the words you might want to use several times in your story.
1. The 'other words for' notes in the Wordpower dictionary can help you with this.
If you look up the word like (verb), you will find a note explaining how to use:
enjoy, spend a lot of time, love, keen on, into and interested in.

2. You can also find other similar words at the entries for some words. If you look up the word smile, you will also find the words beam, grin, smirk. You can look those up to find out exactly what they mean and how they are different from smile.
